alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Larue (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:28AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Larue, central Grayson and southern Hardin Counties through 800 AM EST/700 AM CST/... At 728 AM EST/628 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leitchfield, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Grayson, southern Hardin and southwestern Larue Counties, including the following locations... Rock Creek, Saint Paul, Eastview, Peonia, Solway, Glendale, Black Rock, Tar Hill, Duff and Lacon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST/noon CST/ for central Kentucky.
